```{r}
#| fig-width: 10

# Simulated data based on generation effect literature

    breaks = seq(0, 100, 25),
    labels = function(x) paste0(x, "%")

  labs(
    x = NULL,
```

## Der Expertise-Umkehr-Effekt

<br>

```{ojs}
//| echo: false

// Hidden radio input (drives the state)
viewof vorwissen = {
  const input = Inputs.radio([0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100], {
    value: 20,
    label: "",
    format: x => x + "%"
  });
  input.style.display = "none";
  return input;
}

// Calculate learning effects at current position
// Lines cross at x=50, y=45: highSupport = 65 - 0.4x, lowSupport = 25 + 0.4x
// At x=50: both = 45
highSupport = 65 - 0.4 * vorwissen
lowSupport = 25 + 0.4 * vorwissen
crossoverPoint = 50
isHighBetter = vorwissen <= crossoverPoint
optimal = isHighBetter ? "Hohe Unterst√ºtzung" : "Niedrige Unterst√ºtzung"
optimalColor = isHighBetter ? "#A3195B" : "#666666"
// The y-value for the optimal dot
optimalY = isHighBetter ? highSupport : lowSupport

// Create the plot
expertisePlot = Plot.plot({
  width: 900,
  height: 480,
  marginLeft: 70,
  marginBottom: 60,
  marginTop: 30,
  marginRight: 40,
  style: { fontSize: "16px" },
  x: {
    domain: [0, 100],
    label: "Vorwissen ‚Üí",
    labelOffset: 45,
    ticks: [0, 50, 100],
    tickFormat: d => d === 0 ? "Niedrig" : d === 50 ? "Mittel" : "Hoch"
  },
  y: {
    domain: [0, 100],
    label: "‚Üë Lerneffekt",
    labelOffset: 50,
    grid: true
  },
  marks: [
    // Static lines (cross at x=50, y=45)
    Plot.line([{x: 0, y: 65}, {x: 100, y: 25}], {x: "x", y: "y", stroke: "#A3195B", strokeWidth: 3}),
    Plot.line([{x: 0, y: 25}, {x: 100, y: 65}], {x: "x", y: "y", stroke: "#666666", strokeWidth: 3}),
    // Vertical indicator
    Plot.ruleX([vorwissen], {stroke: "#333", strokeWidth: 1.5, strokeDasharray: "8,5"}),
    // Suboptimal dot (smaller, faded)
    Plot.dot([{x: vorwissen, y: isHighBetter ? lowSupport : highSupport}], {
      x: "x", y: "y",
      fill: isHighBetter ? "#666666" : "#A3195B",
      r: 8,
      opacity: 0.4
    }),
    // Optimal dot (larger, prominent)
    Plot.dot([{x: vorwissen, y: optimalY}], {
      x: "x", y: "y",
      fill: optimalColor,
      r: 14,
      stroke: "white",
      strokeWidth: 3
    }),
    // Icons/labels with examples (near line starts)
    Plot.text([{x: 15, y: 72}], {x: "x", y: "y", text: ["üìñ Worked Examples"], fill: "#A3195B", fontSize: 13}),
    Plot.text([{x: 15, y: 66}], {x: "x", y: "y", text: ["üß≠ Direkte Instruktion"], fill: "#A3195B", fontSize: 13}),
    Plot.text([{x: 85, y: 72}], {x: "x", y: "y", text: ["üß© Problembasiertes Lernen"], fill: "#666666", fontSize: 13}),
    Plot.text([{x: 85, y: 66}], {x: "x", y: "y", text: ["üîç Eigene L√∂sungswege"], fill: "#666666", fontSize: 13}),
    // Line labels (near line ends)
    Plot.text([{x: 88, y: 20}], {x: "x", y: "y", text: ["Hohe Unterst√ºtzung"], fill: "#A3195B", fontSize: 15, fontWeight: "bold"}),
    Plot.text([{x: 12, y: 20}], {x: "x", y: "y", text: ["Niedrige Unterst√ºtzung"], fill: "#666666", fontSize: 15, fontWeight: "bold"})
  ]
})

// Styled segmented control using Inputs.button for each value
buttonGroup = {
  const values = [0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100];
  const buttons = values.map(v => {
    const isSelected = vorwissen === v;
    const bgColor = isSelected ? (v <= 50 ? '#A3195B' : '#666666') : '#f5f5f5';
    const textColor = isSelected ? 'white' : '#333';
    const fontWeight = isSelected ? 'bold' : 'normal';
    const btn = html`<button style="
      padding: 12px 18px;
      border: none;
      background: ${bgColor};
      color: ${textColor};
      font-size: 1em;
      font-weight: ${fontWeight};
      cursor: pointer;
      border-right: 1px solid #ddd;
    ">${v}%</button>`;
    btn.onclick = () => {
      viewof vorwissen.value = v;
      viewof vorwissen.dispatchEvent(new Event('input'));
    };
    return btn;
  });
  const container = html`<div style="display: flex; border-radius: 8px; overflow: hidden; border: 2px solid #ddd;"></div>`;
  buttons.forEach(b => container.appendChild(b));
  return container;
}

// Layout: plot on left, controls on right
html`<div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 40px;">
  <div>${expertisePlot}</div>
  <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 20px; min-width: 280px;">
    <div style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.1em;">Vorwissen des Lernenden</div>
    <div>${buttonGroup}</div>
    <div style="font-size: 1.3em; text-align: center; padding: 15px; background: ${optimalColor}22; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid ${optimalColor};">
      <span style="color: ${optimalColor}; font-weight: bold;">${optimal}</span><br>
      <span style="font-size: 0.8em; color: #666;">ist effektiver</span>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>`
```
